name: Entertainment Cell
description:
Game Introduction:

This is a 2D action-adventure game. Players need to kill addictive cells, find and transport mutant cells and find entertainment cells, collect topaz, and defeat three bosses to successfully leave the spiritual world. The game adopts pixel art style. This game is based on Li Hua's self-redemption in his dream. Finally, Li Hua got rid of the Internet addiction and had better self-control on the Internet.

Game Control:

Click Keyboard A to move left.

Click Keyboard D to move to the right.

Click the space you want to jump to.

Click keyboard J to attack.

Click keyboard K to return to blood.

Click keyboard L to light up dark areas.
